html:
Starter Plan: Essentials

  • Core Features: Foundational tools for project tracking and collaboration for small teams.
  • Analytics: Access to pre-built dashboards with standard performance metrics.
  • Support: Community forum and standard email support with a 48-hour response window.

Professional Plan: Growth

  • Core Features: Advanced automation and custom workflows for growing teams and departments.
  • Analytics: Customizable reports, trend analysis, and deeper performance insights.
  • Support: Priority email and chat support with a dedicated 24-hour response SLA.

Enterprise Plan: At Scale

  • Core Features: Full platform suite with enhanced security controls for entire organizations.
  • Analytics: Predictive forecasting, data warehousing, and custom BI integrations.
  • Support: Dedicated account manager with 24/7 premium phone and live chat support.
